choose_carefully: Choose it carefully. You cannot change it later
confirm_existence: We need to know how to contact you
confirm_password: Enter your master password from the last step and review and agree to our terms of service and privacy policy.
email_verified: Your email address has been verified.
email_verified_complete: You've now provided all the information required. We manually review applications to protect against bots and spam. Due to a high volume of sign ups, this process may take 1â€“3 weeks. We'll email you as soon as you're approved.
email_verified_complete_approved: You are approved! Please check your email.
enjoy_steem: You can now enjoy Steem and all its features.
error_api_create_account: An error occurred while creating the account
error_api_domain_blacklisted: This domain name is blacklisted. Please provide another email address
error_api_email_format: Please provide a valid email address
error_api_general: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later
error_api_phone_too_many: Too many attempts. Please request a new code
error_api_phone_used: This number is already linked to an existing account, or to an account still under review.
error_api_username_used: This username is already in use
error_api_wait: Please wait at least one minute between retries
error_api_actionlimit: You are doing that too much, please try again tomorrow
error_username_taken: The username you chose {username} has already been taken. Please choose another username.
error_validation_account_alpha: Account name should contain only letters, digits, periods, and dashes
error_validation_account_dash: Account name should contain only one dash in a row
error_validation_account_end: Account name should end with a letter or digit
error_validation_account_start: Each username segment should start with a letter
error_validation_account_segment_alpha: Each username segment should contain only letters, digits, and dashes
error_validation_account_segment_dash: Each username segment should contain only one dash in a row
error_validation_account_segment_end: Each username segment should end with a letter or digit
error_validation_account_segment_min: Each username segment should be longer
error_validation_account_segment_start: Each username segment should start with a letter
finish_text_1: After validating your signup request, we will look it over for approval. Please be patient, as it may take time to review the account. As soon as you're approved, you will be sent a link to finalize your account.
finish_text_2: You will be among the earliest members of the Steem community!
finish_text_3: You're few steps aways from getting to the top of the list. Check your email and click the email validation link.
please_confirm: Enter your master password from the last step and review and agree to our terms of service and privacy policy.
must_agree_tos: You must agree to the Terms of Service
must_agree_pp: You must agree to the Privacy Policy
save_password_text: We have generateed a highly secure Master password for you. Please copy it and store it in a safe place offline, like on a text file on a USB drive.
send_sms: We need to send you a quick text.
signup_options_body_1: The Steem blockchain powers many real time content apps like Steemit, and is run by community members all around the world. To help protect them against bots and name squatters, a small fee is charged to create new accounts.
signup_options_body_2: We're happy to cover this fee for you but we'll need your email and phone number to manually check that you're a real person. This process could take 1-2 weeks.
signup_options_body_3: If you'd like to skip the queue or stay anonymous, you can pay the account creation fee using a third party service.
signup_options_referrer: {referrer} is not a typical social app. It's powered by the Steem blockchain.
signup_options_modal_title: Choose a third party paid option
signup_options_blocktrades: A third-party tool that accepts Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, STEEM and more. Blocktrades charges it's own small fee.
signup_options_anonsteem: A third-party tool that accepts Bitcoin, Litecoin and STEEM. AnonSteem also charges it's own a small fee.
signup_options_steemconnect: Try this option if you already have a Steem account and want to pay to set up a new account for yourself or a friend.
signup_options_disclaimer: Note: Steemit, Inc does not receive any money from paid accounts.
signup_username_right_text: A single Steem account gets you into all Steem-based apps
signup_username_right_title: One account is all you need
sms_code: We sent the code to you by SMS to {phoneNumber} {editLink}
username_available: Good news! The username {username} is available.
username_know: Start with a username. Your username is how you'll be known on all Steem-based apps.
username_know_steemit: Start with a username. Your username is how you'll be known on Steemit and other Steem-based apps.
username_steemit_login: Do you already have an account? {link}
